A C D G H I L R S

D

DataHandler - Interface in com.ozdevworx.iface
IMPORTANT NOTE: implementations of this class should be synchronized wherever possible to maintain high data integrity and consistency when handling raw data.

This is a Data-Type interface for an indexed and labeled array of Objects simmillar to the php array concept.
Data should be stored with an index (like a conventional array[]) and a String label.

This Data-Type is the core of this entire JDBC Driver, so using an abstract implementation helps future proof this Driver a little.

Note from the author:
I originally came up with this datatype while writting database intensive desktop applications.
I found that trying to reference large amounts of information via an array index alone is massively error prone and lacking in the sort of dynamics that are required for efficiently dealing with unknown database resultsets.
Once it had matured I noticed it had an even greater potential, which is ultimately where this entire JDBC Driver started.

Who would have thunk it hey ;-)
